cliVerb.name: create
cliVerb.summary: Create an Avro schema for a .NET type.

examples.title: Create a schema for a built-in type
Create a schema for a type in a compiled assembly

options.name: assembly
options.summary: The name of or path to an assembly to load (multiple space-separated values accepted).

options.name: enums-as-ints
options.summary: Whether enums should be represented as integers.

options.name: nullable-references
options.summary: Whether reference types should be nullable.

options.name: temporal-behavior
options.summary: Whether timestamps should be represented with "string" schemas (ISO 8601) or "long" schemas (timestamp logical types). Options are iso8601, epochmilliseconds, and epochmicroseconds.

options.name: type
options.summary: The type to build a schema for.
